description: We decided not to try to kep nova.conf.sample in sync so we need to remove it from the tree.  However we should either generate it in setup.py OR add a README in the sample dir telling people how to generate it
title: Remove nova.conf.sample from the tree replace with README.nova.conf

comments.content: We decided not to try to kep nova.conf.sample in sync so we need to remove it from the tree.  However we should either generate it in setup.py OR add a README in the sample dir telling people how to generate it
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tjones-i

comments.content: We decided to replace with a README and remove the file from the tree.  will add docimpact to ensure the doc team will not be affected
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tjones-i

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 918f6eab7c69ca2c698fa6782ecf1a6639a41938
Author: Tracy Jones <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Mar 19 10:56:49 2014 -0700

    Remove the nova.config.sample file
    
    This file is not gated anymore and therefore it gets
    out of date. Replacing it with a README that explains
    how to generate it
    
    DocImpact
    Closes-Bug: 1294774

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
> "either generate it in setup.py OR add a README in the sample dir telling people how to generate it"

This isn't "either...or" but AND
Reopening to generate it in setup.py so that source tarball includes fresh nova.conf.sample
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~apevec

comments.content:
> > "either generate it in setup.py OR add a README in the sample dir telling people how to generate it"

> This isn't "either...or" but AND
> Reopening to generate it in setup.py so that source tarball includes fresh nova.conf.sample

That's problematic because an accurate config depends on what versions of other libraries you have installed on the system, like oslo.config, oslo.messaging, keystoneclient ...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: If we need to make further enhancements, please open a new bug.  This bug is complete as described.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: New bug is 1301519 - please traget it to Icehouse rc2
